titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the treatment of grain storage and similar structures for purposes of depreciation and the investment tax credit.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/5/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat single purpose commodity storage structures as a qualified agricultural structure for purposes of the investment tax credit and the accelerated cost recovery system.
